modules.name: Mailgun
modules.comments:
This package provides purescript bindings for the node library
[mailgun-js](http://bojand.github.io/mailgun-js/#/README)

declarations.comments:
Provide mailgun with `MailgunCreds` so it will return `Mailgun` which is
required by other modules.
declarations.title: mailgun

modules.name: Mailgun.Bounces
modules.comments:
Mailgun automatically handles bounced emails. The list of bounced
address can be accessed programmatically.

declarations.comments: bounces api.
declarations.title: bounces

declarations.comments: Fetches the list of bounces.
declarations.title: list

declarations.comments: Fetches a single bounces event by a given email address.
declarations.title: info

declarations.comments: Clears a given bounce event.
declarations.title: delete

declarations.comments:
Adds a permanent bounce to the bounces table. Updates the existing record
if alread here.
declarations.title: create

modules.name: Mailgun.Complaints
modules.comments:
This API allows you to programmatically download the list of users who have complained,
add a complaint, or delete a complaint.

declarations.comments: `Complaints` represents the complaints api.
declarations.title: Complaints

declarations.comments: complaints api.
declarations.title: complaints

declarations.comments: Fetches the list of complaints.
declarations.title: list

declarations.comments: Add an address to the complaints table.
declarations.title: create

declarations.comments: Fetches a single spam complaint by a given email address.
declarations.title: info

declarations.comments: Removes a given spam complaint.
declarations.title: delete

modules.name: Mailgun.Credentials
modules.comments: Programatically get and modify domain credentials

declarations.comments: Returns a list of SMTP credentials for the defined domain.
declarations.title: list

declarations.comments: Creates a new set of SMTP credentials for the defined domain
declarations.title: create

declarations.comments: Updates the specified SMTP credentials. Currently only the password can be changed.
declarations.title: update

declarations.comments: Deletes the defined SMTP credentials.
declarations.title: delete

declarations.comments:
This API allows you to create, access, and validate domains
programmcatically.
declarations.title: domain

declarations.comments: Returns a list of domains under your accoung in JSON.
declarations.title: list

declarations.comments: Returns a single domain, includeing credentials and DNS records.
declarations.title: info

declarations.comments: Create a new domain.
declarations.title: create

declarations.comments: Delete a domain from your account
declarations.title: delete

declarations.comments: Verifies and retursn a single domain, including credentials and DNS records.
declarations.title: verify

modules.name: Mailgun.Events
modules.comments:
Query events that happen to your emails.
See. http://documentation.mailgun.com/api-events.html

declarations.comments: events api.
declarations.title: events

declarations.comments: Queries event records.
declarations.title: get

modules.name: Mailgun.MailingList
modules.comments:
Programmatically work with mailing lists and mailing list memebers
using Mailgun Mailing List API.

declarations.comments: mailing list api.
declarations.title: mailingList

declarations.comments: Returns a list of mailing lists under your account.
declarations.title: list

declarations.comments: Returns a single mailing list by a given address.
declarations.title: info

declarations.comments: Create a new mailing list.
declarations.title: create

declarations.comments: Update mailing list properties, such as address, description or name.
declarations.title: update

declarations.comments: Deletes a mailing list.
declarations.title: delete

modules.name: Mailgun.MailingListMembers
modules.comments: Programmatically work with mailing list members.

declarations.comments: members api.
declarations.title: members

declarations.comments: Fetches the list of maling list members.
declarations.title: list

declarations.comments: Paginate over list members in the given mailing list
declarations.title: page

declarations.comments: Retrieve a mailing list member.
declarations.title: info

declarations.comments: Adds a member to the maling list.
declarations.title: create

declarations.comments: Adds multiple members, up to 1,000 per call, to a Mailing List.
declarations.title: add

declarations.comments: Updates a mailing list member with give properties.
declarations.title: update

declarations.comments: Delete a mailing list member.
declarations.title: delete

modules.name: Mailgun.Routes
modules.comments:
Mailgun Routes are powerful way to handle the incoming traffic. This API
allows you to work with routes programmatically.

declarations.comments: routes api
declarations.title: routes

declarations.comments: Fetches the list of routes
declarations.title: list

declarations.comments: Returns a single route object based on its ID.
declarations.title: info

declarations.comments: Create a new route.
declarations.title: create

declarations.comments: Updates a given route by ID.
declarations.title: update

declarations.comments: Deletes a route baed on the ID.
declarations.title: delete

modules.name: Mailgun.Stats
modules.comments:
Various data and events for your mailgun account.
See http://documentation.mailgun.com/api-stats.html

declarations.comments: stats api.
declarations.title: stats

declarations.comments:
Returns a list of event stat items. Each record represents counts for
one event per day.
declarations.title: list

modules.name: Mailgun.Tracking
modules.comments: Programmatically get and modify domain tracking settings.

declarations.comments: Tracking api
declarations.title: tracking

declarations.comments: Returns tracking settings for a domain.
declarations.title: info

declarations.comments: Open Tracking api.
declarations.title: openTracking

declarations.comments: Click Tracking api
declarations.title: clickTracking

declarations.comments: Updates the open tracking settings for a domain.
declarations.title: updateOpenTracking

declarations.comments: Updates the click tracking settings for a domain.
declarations.title: updateClickTracking

declarations.comments: Unsubscribe tracking api.
declarations.title: unsubscribeTracking

declarations.comments: Updates the unsubscribe tracking settings for domain.
declarations.title: updateUnsubTracking

modules.name: Mailgun.Unsubscribes
modules.comments:
This API allows you to programmatically download the list of recipeints
who have unsubscribed from your emails. You can also programmatically
"clear" the unsubscribe event.

declarations.comments: unsubscribes api
declarations.title: unsubscribes

declarations.comments: Fetches the list of unsubscribes.
declarations.title: list

declarations.comments: Retrieve a single unsubscribe record.
declarations.title: info

declarations.comments: Removes an addresss from the unsubscribes table.
declarations.title: delete

declarations.comments: Adds address to unsubscribed table.
declarations.title: create
